snippet: A reversal on a shareholder rights issue would be a bitter pill to swallow for Deutsche Bank’s co-chief executives, Anshu Jain and Jürgen Fitschen. But there are good reasons for one, and the timing looks propitious, the author writes.
abstract: A reversal on a shareholder rights issue would be a bitter pill to swallow for Deutsche Bank’s co-chief executives, Anshu Jain and Jürgen Fitschen. But there are good reasons for one, and the timing looks propitious, the author writes.

headline.main: Why Raising Capital Makes Sense for Deutsche Bank
